title: 01/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Jets hire Robert Saleh, could drastically change the NFL draft

-The Browns upsetting the Chiefs would not be the shocker we all think

-What will the storyline be for each NFL playoff game if there is an upset

-Can Urban Meyer be patient enough to win in Jacksonville

-The narrative that Aaron Rodgers doesn't have enough help is nonsense


Guests: Gerald McCoy, 6x Pro Bowl DT

Aqib Talib, former NFL CB & Super Bowl Champion

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
